text:
Hi there,
Do you know if there is a way to prevent HubSpot from retrying failed webhooks in WFs?
It seems to cause issues when records are stuck in a retrying loop but changes are made on the workflow. We did not find a way to stop it.
Thanks a lot !
cc <@U08A06BGP52>
Is it not possible to use a number property as a matching property option in the create associations action?
Hi all, looking for some assistance with a workflow and just crossposting here (hopefully that's allowed). Thnx for any help you can offer.

If you have operations hub enterprise, you can
1. Use a custom code action to send a request to your application to retrieve the value and update record. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/automation/custom-code-actions>
2. use webhook action to get value and update record. <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/workflows/how-do-i-use-webhooks-with-HubSpot-workflows>
hey <@UCTAN7RPA> Can you explain a bit?
